===== Created using CodeRush 11.2 =====
=== Introduction ===

This plugin allows you to use those Tab to Next Reference skillz to navigate between the attributes of a HTML or XML tag (including their values)

http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CR_AttributeTabber/Screenshots/CR_AttributeTabber.gif 

=== Usage ===
Simply place your caret on an HTML\XML Attribute, and hit either Tab or Shift+Tab to navigate as usual.
